content.text:
# 1995 Hungarian presidential election

The second indirect presidential election was held in Hungary on 19 June 1995. Head of state Árpád Göncz (SZDSZ) was re-elected as president with two-third majority. Since 1990, this is the last presidential election not won by Fidesz or a candidate supported by it.
